GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiTextPr class.

SetStyle.name: SetStyle
SetStyle.description: The text style base method. This method is not used by itself, as it only forms the basis for the {@link ApiRun#SetStyle} method which sets the selected or created style to the text.

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The style which must be applied to the text character.

GetStyle.name: GetStyle
GetStyle.description: Gets the style of the current text properties.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Sets the bold property to the text character.

params.name: isBold
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the run are displayed bold.

GetBold.name: GetBold
GetBold.description: Gets the bold property from the current text properties.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Sets the italic property to the text character.

params.name: isItalic
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed italicized.

GetItalic.name: GetItalic
GetItalic.description: Gets the italic property from the current text properties.

SetStrikeout.name: SetStrikeout
SetStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of the run are displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the line.

params.name: isStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed struck through.

GetStrikeout.name: GetStrikeout
GetStrikeout.description: Gets the strikeout property from the current text properties.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Specifies that the contents of the run are displayed along with a line appearing directly below the character (less than all the spacing above and below the characters on the line).

params.name: isUnderline
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed underlined.

GetUnderline.name: GetUnderline
GetUnderline.description: Gets the underline property from the current text properties.

SetFontFamily.name: SetFontFamily
SetFontFamily.description: Sets all 4 font slots with the specified font family.

params.name: sFontFamily
params.description: The font family or families used for the current text run.

GetFontFamily.name: GetFontFamily
GetFontFamily.description: Gets the font family from the current text properties.

SetFontSize.name: SetFontSize
SetFontSize.description: Sets the font size to the characters of the current text run.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The text size value measured in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

GetFontSize.name: GetFontSize
GetFontSize.description: Gets the font size from the current text properties.

SetColor.name: SetColor
SetColor.description: Sets the text color to the current text run in the RGB format.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: If this parameter is set to "true", then r,g,b parameters will be ignored.

GetColor.name: GetColor
GetColor.description: Gets the RGB color from the current text properties.

SetVertAlign.name: SetVertAlign
SetVertAlign.description:
Specifies the alignment which will be applied to the contents of the run in relation to the default appearance of the run text:

  • "baseline" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned by the default text baseline.
  • "subscript" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned below the default text baseline.
  • "superscript" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned above the default text baseline.

params.name: sType
params.description: The vertical alignment type applied to the text contents.

GetVertAlign.name: GetVertAlign
GetVertAlign.description: Gets the vertical alignment type from the current text properties.

SetHighlight.name: SetHighlight
SetHighlight.description: Specifies a highlighting color which is added to the text properties and applied as a background to the contents of the current run/range/paragraph.

params.name: sColor
params.description: Available highlight color.

GetHighlight.name: GetHighlight
GetHighlight.description: Gets the highlight property from the current text properties.

SetSpacing.name: SetSpacing
SetSpacing.description: Sets the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point.

params.name: nSpacing
params.description: The value of the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

GetSpacing.name: GetSpacing
GetSpacing.description: Gets the text spacing from the current text properties measured in twentieths of a point.

SetDoubleStrikeout.name: SetDoubleStrikeout
SetDoubleStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of the run are displayed with two horizontal lines through each character displayed on the line.

params.name: isDoubleStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed double struck through.

GetDoubleStrikeout.name: GetDoubleStrikeout
GetDoubleStrikeout.description: Gets the double strikeout property from the current text properties.

SetCaps.name: SetCaps
SetCaps.description: Specifies that any lowercase characters in the text run are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents.

params.name: isCaps
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed capitalized.

GetCaps.name: GetCaps
GetCaps.description: Specifies whether the text with the current text properties are capitalized.

SetSmallCaps.name: SetSmallCaps
SetSmallCaps.description: Specifies that all the small letter characters in the text run are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents which are two points smaller than the actual font size specified for this text.

params.name: isSmallCaps
params.description: Specifies if the contents of the current run are displayed capitalized two points smaller or not.

GetSmallCaps.name: GetSmallCaps
GetSmallCaps.description: Specifies whether the text with the current text properties are displayed capitalized two points smaller than the actual font size.

SetPosition.name: SetPosition
SetPosition.description: Specifies an amount by which text is raised or lowered for this run in relation to the default baseline of the surrounding non-positioned text.

params.name: nPosition
params.description: Specifies a positive (raised text) or negative (lowered text) measurement in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

GetPosition.name: GetPosition
GetPosition.description: Gets the text position from the current text properties measured in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetLanguage.name: SetLanguage
SetLanguage.description: Specifies the languages which will be used to check spelling and grammar (if requested) when processing the contents of the text run.

params.name: sLangId
params.description: The possible value for this parameter is a language identifier as defined by RFC 4646/BCP 47. Example: "en-CA".

GetLanguage.name: GetLanguage
GetLanguage.description: Gets the language from the current text properties.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specifies the shading applied to the contents of the current text run.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type applied to the contents of the current text run.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

GetShd.name: GetShd
GetShd.description: Gets the text shading from the current text properties.

SetFill.name: SetFill
SetFill.description: Sets the text color to the current text run.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the text color.

GetFill.name: GetFill
GetFill.description: Gets the text color from the current text properties.

SetTextFill.name: SetTextFill
SetTextFill.description: Sets the text fill to the current text run.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the text color.

GetTextFill.name: GetTextFill
GetTextFill.description: Gets the text fill from the current text properties.

SetOutLine.name: SetOutLine
SetOutLine.description: Sets the text outline to the current text run.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the text outline.

GetOutLine.name: GetOutLine
GetOutLine.description: Gets the text outline from the current text properties.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiTextPr object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteStyles
params.description: Specifies if the used styles will be written to the JSON object or not.
